convo.speech: PROBE: Oh my God! I've killed a dead hobo!
BLEED: I'm not dead! Argh... Quickly - you have to cut me open!
PROBE: Uh... I've got a pizza cutter!
PROBE: Who are you?
BLEED: My name is Ignacious Bleed.
PROBE: Can you teach me that - how to do surgery?
BLEED: Teach surgery? I...I couldn't. Not again...
PROBE: Why not? I've got a bunch more tools in the van. And if that pool table over there doesn't scream operation, I don't know what does!
BLEED: And who would want to be operated on by a washed-up old tramp and a pizza boy?
*CRASH!!*
TOMMY: Urrrr...
PROBE: Hello mister burglar! Fall through the window trying to rob our clinic?
TOMMY: C...clinic?
PROBE: Yep! You're in luck - today's special is glass-extraction!
TOMMY: Urgh...wow. Hey - do I recognize you?
BLEED: Me? No no...I'm sure you couldn't!
TOMMY: There was a doctor got himself into a heap of trouble a few years back...lotsa unexplained deaths.
TOMMY: Then he just disappeared...
Bleed: Thank you! Come again!
PROBE: Hmm. So, was it true what he said? You're a doctor?
BLEED: No! I mean, I used to...
PROBE: Can you teach me how to cut - I mean, help people?
BLEED: Alright, Alan. But we may have to improvise with the tools a little...
CLETUS: Hay, can yew guys help out a friend?
PROBE: Whoa! That porcupine has a hillbilly stuck on its ass!
CLETUS: I went to, uh, pick-up this here prickle-pig, but done fell on it instead.
CLETUS: Hay! That was pretty good! Thanks kindly!
PROBE: So are you really the renegade doctor that burglar was talking about before?
BLEED: Alan, you have some real talent. I will continue to train you if it's what you want...
PROBE: It's what I've ALWAYS wanted!
BLEED: But I will only do so on the condition that we do not talk about my past! It is uneventful and uninteresting, I assure you!
PROBE: Ok! You're the boss...doc!
CLAUDE: I heard you boys were surgeons of a kind... *Glug-glug-glug*
PROBE: Hello...Are you drinking PAINT?!
CLAUDE: Doesn't say I shouldn't on the can! And that means a big fat payout from the paint company! Same goes for the nailgun maker who didn't mention I shouldn't shoot myself in the chest!
PROBE: One de-nailing coming up!
CLAUDE: You guys are OK. Here - take my chainsaw as a thank you! I'm sure a pair of makeshift surgeons such as yourselves could use it!
PROBE: Sweet! Hey doc, you have anything you need amputating? Rrrm-rrrm!
BLEED: (Sigh...)
TRENT: Doctors! You gotta help! I was down at the bank, robbing... Uh, I mean, making a deposit... And I slipped and fell on some bullets!
TRENT: You guys are great! The only hospital round here closed down a few years ago. Some nasty stuff went down there...
BLEED: Well, don't let us keep you!
TRENT: Right! Thanks again! I'll spread the word about you guys!
GUTS: I'm Gus, but folks call me "Guts." I run the junkyard downtown - body disposals and whatnot...
PROBE: Car bodies? Or...
PROBE: Never mind!
GUTS: I feel terrible! I can't eats no more!
GUTS: Glaaaargh!
GUTS: See what I means?
GUTS: Can you guys take a look-see?
PROBE: (shudder)
GUTS: Ahhh... Dat's better! And there's nuttin' like a good clear-out to work up an appetite! T'anks, fellas!
PROBE: Well, that was disgusting! Goodbye now, Guts!
JACK: My nickname's "Lumbar" Jack. Partly because of my profession, but mainly because of my back, eh? It pains me something fearsome!
PROBE: Nurse! Anesthetic please!
BLEED: I'm not your nurse, Alan!
JACK: That feels...
JACK: *CRACK!*
JACK: Oh yes! Ooh, I'll be back to wrestlin' bears and violating forests in no time!
PROBE: Right...well! Don't get the two confused! Have fun now!
EDDY: *sniff sniff* Are you the vet? I mean, surgeon?
EDDY: I'm Eddy the Dog. Know why they call me that?
PROBE: You clean yourself with your tongue?
EDDY: What? No! *growl*
EDDY: I'm full of tracking chips and the police make me wear this collar!
PROBE: We can remove those for you. Up on the table!
EDDY: I'm allowed on the furniture? Sweet!
EDDY: Oh man, thanks! You know, have you guys ever considered going upscale? Maybe moving to the city?
BLEED: Oh no! I much prefer the quiet life!
PROBE: But doc, think what we could do! There'd be loads more interesting stuff in the city!
BLEED: I said no, Alan!
PROBE: I still need more practice! Wouldn't moving to the city-
BLEED: Alan - you are a very talented young man. In fact, you remind me of a student I once had...
PROBE: Really? You mentioned a student before! What happened to him?
PROBE: ...or was it a HER?!
BLEED: Never mind! Listen to me Alan - you said you wanted my help. Fine. I will help you.
BLEED: But all I want is a quiet life! Here! Out of the way! Is that clear?
MEATSACK: 'Ullo lads! I've come into some right nice organs recently.
MEATSACK: Seeing as me own heart's a bit rickety, I was hoping you could do me some swaps, like?
MEATSACK: In return, I'll see you get all the juicy organs a budding young surgeon could need!
MEATSACK: Look at the tubes on that! Glistening, they are!
PROBE: Let's do it!
MEATSACK: Nice jobs lads! Tell me though, a place like this is hardly fitting for chaps like you, is it?
MEATSACK: There's plenty of work in the city! Haven't you heard?
MEATSACK: Some nutjob has started running around maiming folk! Terrible, it is!
PROBE: Doc, did you hear what that guy said? The city needs us!
PROBE: I don't want to be a pizza boy forever!
PROBE: And one day I want to have my own surgery! For real! Please...
PROBE: And what about you! Surely you must want something better for yourself!
BLEED: I need to think. I'm going for a walk.
PROBE: Hey! Wait...doc...
PROBE: Man, I can't believe the doc left me on my own. What if some utter headcase comes in? I-
HORRACE: Bonsoir. I am Horrace.
HORRACE: You are the pizza boy who operates with a spoon?
PROBE: Pizza cutter, actually.
HORRACE: Take up your spoon, child! I will be most interested to see what you find within me!
PROBE: You were full of weird bugs but I killed them all.
HORRACE: Did you know the brighter and more beautiful the creature, the more extravagant and excruciating its poison?
PROBE: OK! Well that's great! Off you go now!
GIRL: Hey you! I'm looking for someone!
PROBE: (She's hot!)
PROBE: Listen, whoever it is you're looking for, I think it might be me!
GIRL: Euch.
GIRL: I wanted the...surgeon. Goodbye.
PROBE: Hey wait! Wait!
PROBE: Argh! This stupid uniform! How can anyone recognize me as a master surgeon when I'm wearing this thing?
PROBE: Man, where's the doc gotten to? I hope he's not gone off on another cough syrup bender and walked out in front of a car again...
BLEED: Alan, I've been thinking... We should go to the city.
PROBE: Ha! Great! You know, this just my day for good news! There was a really beautiful girl here just now. She was looking for "the surgeon". Ha!
PROBE: Guess she didn't realize she'd found him! Woo!
BLEED: A girl? Goodness... No, it couldn't be...
PROBE: Never mind! Let's get this show on the road!
PROBE: Big city, get ready for the Alan Probing of a lifetime!
PROBE: "Probe and Bleed, Back Alley MDs" - got a nice ring to it, eh doc?
BLEED: Never mind that. Someone is coming - this could be trouble!
BRUTALITY: All right! Who's the graffiti artist 'round here? Speak up, maggots!
PROBE: Uh, I'm Alan Probe, I'm a surgeon, and this is...
BRUTALITY: Surgeons, eh? Well! You boys are gonna help me!
PROBE: Ok...what's -
BRUTALITY: No questions! Get to fixin'!
BRUTALITY: Hoo! That's better. Don't know why I did that. People I arrested just kept suggesting it. Guess I got curious.
PROBE: Well, as long as you're happy, sir!
BRUTALITY: Some whack-job round here has started attacking criminals and messin' them up real bad... So carry on, and keep an eye out!
BRUTALITY: ...you can keep the handcuffs.
PROBE: Ewwwww...
VINCE: You guys are surgeons? I just got attacked!
VINCE: I was just minding my own business, siphoning off some petrol from a car, when someone snuck up behind me!
VINCE: BAAAAAAARP!
PROBE: Cool! Well, let's take a look!
VINCE: Whew. Thanks guys - that was ace.
PROBE: No problem! Spread the word!
BLEED: Alan, I've been thinking... Your current outfit isn't really suitable any more, so I grabbed this as we left the warehouse.
PROBE: Look at me! I'm a super-hot surgeon!
PROBE: Thanks doc! All the ladies are going to be saying, "Help me doctor! I have acute angina!" and I'll be all, "Hmm! I'd best take a look!" and...
BLEED: Alan! Could we focus, please! I think we have another patient!
VALERIE: Hey! Pipsqueak! Yeah, you in the overalls hanging out with the tramp!
PROBE: What a bit- I mean... How can we help you, sir?
VALERIE: SIR?! You little...!
PROBE: Oh... OH! I am so, so sorry! I thought you were a dude dressed up like a cheap hooker. Sorry!
VALERIE: I guess I asked for that. Listen, I suffer from multiple personalities, which is bad for business...
VALERIE: Could you... You know, fix me?
VALERIE: I feel...good.
PROBE: (Urgh, well you don't look so good!)
PROBE: So long, pretty lady!
EDGAR: Listen lads, I've heard there's some nutter going round attacking criminals.
EDGAR: Now, I'm not an out-an-out criminal as such, but I don't want to take a chance!
PROBE: How can we he-
EDGAR: Glad you asked! I want you to fill me so chock-full of steroids that anyone thinking about messing with me is gonna regret it!
EDGAR: Hoo yeah! Feelin' pretty brutal!
PROBE: You're really worried about being attacked?
EDGAR: Hey, there's some pretty bad stuff been going around last couple of weeks!
EDGAR: But I should leave you gents in peace. Thanks for your help! Stay safe!
DONNY: Gentlemen, gentlemen! Allow me to introduce myself: I am Donny Debonair - Pimp Extraordinaire!
PROBE: Funky!
DONNY: Damn straight! And these two are my number one girls!
DONNY: Gimme some sugar, ladies!
DONNY: Mmmm-hmmm!
DONNY: Ah yeah!
DONNY: Anyway, to business! I want you two fine surgeons to bling-bling my internal organs! That's right baby!
DONNY: In return, I'll throw in some time with one of my ladies here!
PROBE: (shudder) Uh - I tell you what, let's worry about the details later!
DONNY: Ooo-hooo! I'm feeling percentages more pimp! PERCENTAGES! I feel it, baby!
PROBE: So, have you heard anything about criminals getting attacked?
DONNY: Hmm. Word is, problems started around the same time some creepy French dude started hanging around...
PROBE: French? Hmm...
JOE: Uh... Guys? Will you help me?
PROBE: I think we should be able to... Whew! What did you do, eat a bunch of garbage and then sleep in a dumpster?
JOE: Yeah... I guess, pretty much. Sorry. Listen - it's Ted... He needs to move out.
PROBE:...
JOE: Uh, Ted's my tapeworm.
JOE: Oh man... Ted! What have I done? Oh man...
PROBE: Hey! He was a giant, gross parasite who was slowly killing you! What are you upset about!
JOE: Yeah. But... He was my only friend.
PROBE: Huh. Well, I guess they say it's those closest to our hearts that can hurt us the most...
BLEED: I don't think they meant it in a strictly anatomical sense, Alan...
PETER: Surgeons! You have to help! I've been poisoned!
PROBE: Poisoned? I knew it! Did someone attack you? WHAT THE HECK IS THAT?!
PETER: Oh, you mean Mister Caruthers? He is my pet komodo dragon and my good friend!
PETER: Today he would not eat his caviar, so I said "Mister Caruthers! You must eat your caviar! Look! It is delicious - nom nom nom!"
PETER: And I ate some to show him, but someone had swapped it for spider eggs! Now I am going to die... Of spiders!
PROBE: Ok! We'll do what we can!
PETER: That was very scary! Thank you both!
PROBE: You know doc, I've seen something similar to that before!
PROBE: Back at the warehouse a guy came in full of bugs! He almost seemed to like it! I fixed him, but...
BLEED: You performed surgery without me? Alan! That was madness!
PROBE: No, it's fine! I did great, but... Oh never mind.
KARL: Hey guys! Guys! You gotta help me, see? I was at customs, ok? Customs! Coming back from the coffee capital of the world oh man you should have seen all the coffees they had!
KARL: But I had too much coffee they said! TOO MUCH! I said I'll tell YOU when I've had enough!
KARL: I had to hide it! Had to! I have to have that sweet, sweet caffeine kick!
KARL: slurp-slurp-slurp
KARL: Oh baby! Oh boy that's good! But anyway! Shut up! I'm talking! The coffee - I hid it! Now I need it back!
KARL: You gotta get it back for me! Do your surgeon thing! Do it do it! Make with the ol' slice and dice, the old snip-snip chop-chop!
PROBE: Ohhh-kay! And breathe!
KARL: Oh wowee, oh yowza! You got it! Oh I could kiss you! I could kiss the coffee, that sweet, sweet mocha temptress...
KARL: slurp-slurp-slurp
PROBE: You're welcome!
ANIMAL: Hey you there. I'm sick. Ate something that disagreed with me.
PROBE: Was it fast food?
ANIMAL: Not especially. I caught him while I was wearing my straitjacket after all! HAR HAR HAR!
PROBE: (Let's get him on the table and get him the heck out of here!)
BLEED: (Agreed!)
ANIMAL: I recognize you, Dr. Bleed.
BLEED: I... Me? How...?
ANIMAL: I saw you. Saw you when I was in the Old Hospital. All those people died...
PROBE: Doc? What's he talking about?
ANIMAL: You were the bedpan fairy!
ANIMAL: Dance, fairy! Dance your pixie dance for me again! HAR HAR HAR! WOOOOOO! HAR HAR!
PROBE: (The Old Hospital? Is it true... Or is he just crazy?)
PROBE: Doc... What that guy said. Did you work at the Old Hospital? I heard about that. It shut down because a bunch of people died...
BLEED: Alan...
PROBE: I want to know what's happened, doc - but it'll have to wait. We've got a patient!
PROBE: Hey! You're... Eddy?!
EDDY: Doc...help me! They... Someone set a dog on me! I...
PROBE: He's in a bad way! We need to get going!
PROBE: He'll pull through. But that was attempted murder!
PROBE: who's doing this? And what happened at the Old Hospital? What happend with YOU?
BLEED: I... I will explain what I can, Alan. But for now... It looks like we have another patient.
PROBE: Ahhhh! Doc, you can't leave me hanging like this! I want to know now!
TRENT: Guys...*gack*... I was just walking along, minding my own business, and suddenly some girl stabbed me!
TRENT: Look!
PROBE: Why are you naked!?
BLEED: Alan, whatever happened, those wounds are deep! We need to operate!
GIRL: Where is he? I will kill him!
PROBE: You're the girl from the warehouse! What...were YOU following Trent?
GIRL: You're the ones who have been undoing all my work! Do you have any IDEA how hard I've been working to take those filthy criminals down?
PROBE: WHAT?! You're the one going around attacking everyone! I thought it was that Horrace guy!
GIRL: Who? You disgust me! But it doesn't matter - I've almost got him! I've been waiting so long!
PROBE: Wait!
BLEED: Alan! That girl who was just here...
PROBE: She's the one from the warehouse! That showed up after I fixed the creepy French dude! I tried to tell you...
BLEED: I know that girl... I believe it's me she's looking for. She wants to kill me.
PROBE: What!? That's insane.
BLEED: I'm afraid not. I killed her parents. I am a murderer, Alan.
BLEED: She can explain to you herself. We are going back to the Old Hospital - MY Old Hospital...
BLEED: Well Alan... Welcome to the Old Hospital. This place was like a home to me.
PROBE: Wow! Look at that sign! Was that..."Bleed's Wing"? You must have been a legend!
BLEED: Ha. That was a long time ago. I used to stand right here, right in this spot! Along with... My student.
PROBE: Your student? What was he like?
BLEED: Ha... His name was Pipe. Dwayne Pipe. An unfortunate name, perhaps, but he was quite brilliant.
BLEED: He was forced to leave. My patients... They started dying. I was killing them - but I never understood how it was happening. They were fine one minute and then...
PROBE: Wow... And you think that girl who wants to kill you is HERE?
BLEED: I believe so. Her parents were the last ones to die under my care...
PROBE: Someone's coming!
PETER: Doctors! The weird guy in the trenchcoat in the alley said you'd be here!
PETER: It happened again! I'm poisoned!
PETER: I don't want to die!
PETER: Hrrrruuuugh!
PROBE: Oh man! Hold in there Peter!
PETER: Ugh... Thank you! I don't know what happened!
PROBE: Peter, have you seen a girl around here?
PETER: A girl? No - but I heard the city's crime boss is plenty mad about what's been happening to everyone!
PETER: He's on his way! I have to get out of here! Mister Caruthers will get nervous!
PETER: And when he's nervous, he gets gassy and aggressive, in that order!
HENCHMAN: Doktor!
HENCHMAN: DOKTOR!
HENCHMAN: We are drive here to kill person who is hurting all our lovely criminals!
HENCHMAN: But someone is cut our brakes! We are crash into sewage farm! Was not fun.
BLEED: Alan, you must be very, very careful. We need to treat them back to back! I shudder to think what would happen to us should one of them perish on our table...
PROBE: I understand. Quickly then!
BLEED: Those two will sleep for a while. We must find Aureola - before she gets hurt!
PROBE: Wait! Doesn't she want to kill you?
BLEED: I think the poor girl has been driven mad with grief. If it's me she wants... I should speak to her.
BLEED: This isn't her fault, Alan...
BLEED: Wait.. Who is that?
GUTS: Doc... Thanks goodness youse are here!
GUTS: I think I ate something really bad!
GUTS: I means, a girl stopped by and gave me a sandwich! She was real pretty... I ate it in kind of a hurry. But it tasted like metal! And now...
GUTS: *tick tick tick*
PROBE: Oh wow... I hope that's a clock!
GUTS: A bomb? Oh yowzers - so I was nearly blowed up?
PROBE: Yes. *shudder*. But don't touch it! We didn't quite manage to defuse it completely!
GIRL: So you've done it again, have you?
GIRL: Fixed some worthless lowlife criminal?
GUTS: You! Youse was at the junkyard! You tried to kill me! You're crazy!
GIRL: I'm not crazy!
BLEED: Aureola...
AUREOLA: What? How do you know my name?
AUREOLA: Who are you?
BLEED: You don't recognize me, child? Well, maybe that's understandable. I am somewhat gone to ruin...
BLEED: I am the man you're looking for. I was the surgeon who operated on your parents.
BLEED: I am sorry they died.
BLEED: I understand you mean to take your vengeance. I must admit... I have thought about ending it myself.
BLEED: In fact, not too long ago I deliberately stepped out in front of a pizza van! If it weren't for this extraordinary young man here... Well...
AUREOLA: Dr. Bleed?
BLEED: ...yes.
AUREOLA: Oh doctor! I thought... But it's not you I'm looking for!
AUREOLA: IT'S HIM!
HORRACE: Bonjour!
AUREOLA: MURDERER!
BLEED: Dwayne!
PROBE: DWAYNE?!
DWAYNE: Ah, my dear sweet mentor, Dr. Bleed. I would ask how you are after all these years... But I can see for myself! You are disgusting.
PROBE: You were the doc's old student? YOU'RE Dwayne Pipe? You said your name was Horrace!
DWAYNE: I've been hiding in the jungle since this insane little witch started hunting me down. When I came back, do you really think I'd use my real, horrible name?
AUREOLA: You animal! This bomb wasn't meant for you, but...
PROBE: No! That bomb isn't fully defused! DON'T-
*BOOM*
AUREOLA: Ahhhhh!
PROBE: AUREOLA!
DWAYNE: Ah ha ha! Pathetic!
BLEED: Dwayne... What happened to you?
DWAYNE: You were always so boring, Dr. Bleed! There is so much to be learned from the sweet kiss of the poison needle!
DWAYNE: But who cares! That was then, and this is now. And before I leave - a parting gift, my dear doctor!
DWAYNE: The same poison that did in all your precious patients!
BLEED: Grooo....
DWAYNE: Ha! I could kill you too, pizza boy! But how much better to let you try to save him - and know his demise was down to the failing of your own fat fingers!
DWAYNE: Mwuahahahaha! MWUAHAHAHAHA! Bonne nuit!
PROBE: Doc! Hold on! He won't get away with this!
PROBE: I saved them! Doc and Aureola will pull through! But Horrace - Dwayne - got away...
BRUTALITY: Dammit maggot! When I say "assume the position", I mean you do it now! NOW! GET ON THE FLOOR!
DWAYNE: Ah! Help! Help! He is crazy!
PROBE: Officer Brutality?
BRUTALITY: Probe? I should have guessed it! Reports came in that there was an explosion at the Old Hospital.
BRUTALITY: I came running, and found Nancy Fancy-pants here fleeing the scene!
DWAYNE: *whimper* Please - no more beatings! Enough!
BRUTALITY: I'll TELL you when you've had enough!
DWAYNE: Ack...my stomach!
PROBE: Whoah! Hey - easy! Easy! Look at that!
BRUTALITY: What's happening to his stomach?
PROBE: I don't know! Unless... Get him to the operating table!
DWAYNE: Ah! Help! Officer, he wants to spoon me! AAARRGH!
PROBE: Wow! I guess I didn't kill all those weird bugs in him after all. Actually, that was a pretty big one to miss!
BRUTALITY: So, Probe... Care to tell me what's going on? You find out who was behind all the attacks?
PROBE: (Aureola... But none of this was really her fault, even if she did go off the rails a bit! Plus she's hot!)
PROBE: Officer, I think I can say with a clear conscience that Horrace d'Obscene - a.k.a. Dwayne Pipe - is the man ultimately responsible for all your injured criminals!
PROBE: And if you could, would you reopen the file on the deaths at the Old Hospital? I think you'll find there's new evidence to clear Dr. Bleed...
BRUTALITY: Son, when you helped me, you pulled the proverbial thorn from the lion's paw. And by "thorn", I mean "handcuffs". And by "lion's paw", I mea-
PROBE: I remember!
BRUTALITY: Point is I'm going to help you out. And I reckon I've got a special punishment in mind that should be right up Mister Pipe's alley!
PROBE: Hey! What's that down the alley? Push it over here!
PROBE: Wow!
PROBE: Let's get the sheet off!
PROBE: AWESOME!
PROBE: Holy smoke! Look at that bad boy!
PROBE: "The DeLirium"...cool name! It's like what people from 20 years ago thought a car from the future would look like!
BLEED: Alan, there's no time for this! We need to get back to the suture...
BLEED: I mean, back to the suturing, and the cutting, and all the rest of the surgery!
PROBE: No way! Look, I reckon we can fix this!
PROBE: Hmm...what's a "Flux Capacitor?"
PROBE: Never mind! If there's a problem that can't be solved by random hacking and slashing, I don't want to hear about it!
BLEED: Great Scott!
PROBE: Huh. After we pushed it back down the alley, I pressed a button marked "five minutes into the future" - and the car disappeared! Weird!
OFFSCREEN VOICE 1: Morty! Quick! We have to get to the old clock tower for exactly when the lightning strik...-WHERE THE HECK IS THE CAR?
OFFSCREEN VOICE 2: I don't know, Doc! It was right here! Literally right where you're standing right now!
*FZZZZFT!*
OFFSCREEN VOICE 1: *ARRGH!* Oh sweet mother of... I've been hit by a time-travelling car! My chest is all broken! Arrrgh...!
BLEED: Should we go help them?
PROBE: Hmm...nah. We already did a car-crash rib surgery, remember?
PROBE: I hit you with the pizza van right back at the start of the game?
BLEED: Oh yes! Ha! Happy days...
OFFSCREEN VOICE 1: Augh! I'm bleeding heavily from my ear... It's all going dark...
PROBE: Well, back to the surgery!
BIZZARE-LOOKING ROBOT: Greetings humans! I am short-circuiting and in need of your assistance!
BIZZARE-LOOKING ROBOT: Can you open my access panel and rewire me?
PROBE: Who... What are you?
BIZZARE-LOOKING ROBOT: I am a Bio-Utility Mechanoid, but most people just call me by my initials.
PROBE: Bio-Utility Mechanoid... So, BUM the robot? That's gross!
BUM: It gets better! Care to guess where my access panel is located?
PROBE: This is the worst bonus mission ever.
PROBE: Well, that was awkward, rummaging around in your nether circuits and all.
BUM: Please, human. I am merely a machine. I have no emotion or feeling. You should not feel uncomfortable.
BUM: Now, could you please close my hatch again?
PROBE: Fine...
*CLICK*
BUM: My! What cold hands you have!
PROBE: That's it! Get out!
BUM: What? You're not even going to buy me dinner?
PROBE: OUT!
STUPORMAN: *KAPOW!* I am the mighty Stuporman! Faster than a receding mullet, more powerful than a... Ah forget it. Point is, I'm great.
STUPORMAN: Hear now my tragic background story: my nemesis Les Loser has poisoned me with deadly Kraptonite and it totally sucks.
PROBE: I like this guy!
STUPORMAN: My potent ass-ray vision (don't ask) shows me you two are expert-level surgeons. Only to such talent can I entrust my incredible physique.
PROBE: That's some nice crotch-stuffing. What is that? A brick?
STUPORMAN: Yes. Now, God speed, gentlemen...and keep your filthy hands off my brick.
STUPORMAN: Good work, citizens. As my people would say on Krapton, "Live long and prosper."
PROBE: Ah ha ha! Sure that's not Vulcans?
STUPORMAN: Silence, mortal.
STUPORMAN: Now, go-go-gadget feet!
STUPORMAN: Hnnnngh!
STUPORMAN: ...
STUPORMAN: That just means I've decided to walk. You have the gratitude of all of Eternia.
PROBE: Well, I think that was worth the price of the free download for this game just in itself!
BLEED: Do you really think he was worried we'd try to touch a brick that he'd been keeping in his pants?
PROBE: Ha! Well, back to business!
